items.title: Lightning Fast
items.description: Achieve enhanced images in seconds with our state-of-the-art algorithms. No wait time required.

items.title: User Friendly

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to sharper images

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Upload your photo through drag-and-drop or by browsing. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our advanced AI intelligently sharpens your images while preserving their original quality.

items.title: Download Result
items.description: View the enhanced image and download it in high resolution for your use.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless users who have transformed their images with our sharpening technology

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: The sharpness improvement on my travel photos was phenomenal! It looks like I used professional equipment.

items.name: James Smith
items.comment: As a photographer, this tool has dramatically saved me time by enhancing image quality in just a few clicks.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common inquiries about our sharpening technology

items.title: What types of images benefit from sharpening?
items.description: AI Image Sharpening is ideal for various images, including landscapes, portraits, and any image where detail enhancement is needed. It effectively brings out nuances that might be lost.

items.title: Is the service free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user has access to 30 free credits daily, enabling you to enhance multiple images with ease. Additional credits can be earned through participation on our Discord server.

items.title: Can enhanced images be used commercially?
items.description: Yes! Users on any subscription plan can use their sharpened images for commercial purposes, while free users are limited to personal projects.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All image enhancement occurs directly within your browser, utilizing advanced technology. Your photos are never sent to our servers, ensuring complete confidentiality.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Images?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and witness the transformation yourself. No sign-up necessary.
